explanation: [0-0] A woman wearing a black baseball cap and sunglasses is sitting in a covered seating area, enjoying an ice cream cone. A child sits next to her, watching her. In front of them is a little boy in khaki clothes. Buildings and trees can be seen in the distance.

[0-3] Next, as the woman eats her ice cream, a man in a floral shirt appears behind her and takes a big bite out of her cone, leaving only a little bit. The shot zooms in on the woman's surprised face as she looks at the remaining ice cream.
